description: This file defines a LoginFragment class for an Android TV-friendly login screen. It manages UI elements including email and password input fields, sign-in and register buttons, and a forgot password link. It specifies a focus order suitable for TV remote navigation, handles user interactions such as button clicks and key events, and applies custom focus styling.

classes.name: LoginFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that provides a login UI optimized for Android TV, including focus management and user interaction handling.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of LoginFragment.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the login fragment layout, initializes UI elements, sets up focus order and styles, and assigns event handlers for user interactions.

methods.name: showError
methods.description: Displays an error message in the UI.

methods.name: applyFocusOutline
methods.description: Applies visual focus styling to a view, including scaling and background changes.
